I use Daemontools to mount it though, instead of the built in mounter. HereÂ´s what you do:
After setting up your standard folder for Dosbox and all that, just mount the image with Daemontools, and then check what drive it is (e:,i: etc...) Then in Dosbox type:
MOUNT d i:\ -t cdrom (of course substitute "i" for whatever letter the virtual drive has).
Now navigate in Dosbox to the root folder of the game and type "s". You can of course automate the mounting-part by inserting the relevant lines  at the end of "dosbox.conf" in your Dosboxfolder.
